nodes.title: 58410A5A - Super Meat Boy (US)
nodes.body:
[Marketplace](https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Super-Meat-Boy/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d80258410a5a)

v0.0.0.1

Tested against xenia-project/xenia@ea99ba8e3bbac03386c95efe1496d5f4b03f5456.

Gameplay is largely functional (aside from lack of sound support) with minor issues, and performance issues. There are issues with texture invalidation, which are mostly corrected by pressing F5 to force it. Loading and saving of settings is not working, causing the default sound volumes to be 0.
- [ ] Issues with texture invalidation when switching scenes.
- [ ] Performance issues, likely related to threading priority issues.
- [ ] Problem with save/load of settings data (not save data). This causes audio settings to start at 0.

nodes.title: 584109DD - Final Fight: Double Impact
nodes.body:
[Marketplace](https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Final-Fight-DblImpact/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d802584109dd)

v0.0.1.3

Tested against xenia-project/xenia@ea99ba8e3bbac03386c95efe1496d5f4b03f5456.

Introduction logos and initial title screen works, with a "press start" prompt. Unfortunately there is frequent stalling during these screens.
- [ ] Threads frequently stall, break/continue in debugger can get things running again.
- [ ] Random crash trying to load a null pointer, doesn't always happen.
- [ ] When verifying license, calls XamContentGetLicenseMask with an overlapped ptr, which is not currently implemented. So the game dies out here.
- [ ] Calls NetDll_WSARecvFrom, which is unimplemented.
- [ ] Calls NetDll_WSAGetOverlappedResult, which is unimplemented.

nodes.title: 58410B3A - I Am Alive
nodes.body:
[Marketplace](https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/I-Am-Alive/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d80258410b3a)

`Oct 24, 2015`
Tested on xenia-project/xenia@c3ecb1bde938475fa84dccc2f9c353cc752519fd

Compared to my last experience on https://github.com/benvanik/xenia/commit/6d4d1db3106028cce6e28b5cb099324e146a7a25 The intro videos visually look fine, no more garbage. However, when the second video after the Ubisoft logo is played Xenia crashes completely. A work around is to remove this video files from the game directory which progresses the game to the menus. Goes in-game which results in a white screen, nothing happens after this and pressing the pause button to bring up the pause menu causes a crash.

![Intro](https://i.imgur.com/8UR2gV4.png)
![Intro](https://i.imgur.com/ropdqye.png)
![Intro](https://i.imgur.com/fmETery.png)
![Intro](https://i.imgur.com/Zk2NjmF.png)
![Intro](https://i.imgur.com/Ij4dbxw.png)
![Intro](https://i.imgur.com/WcOIoQJ.png)
![Intro](https://i.imgur.com/Sy4JmtY.png)

`Jun 12, 2015`
Tested on xenia-project/xenia@6d4d1db3106028cce6e28b5cb099324e146a7a25

The Ubisoft Logo and intro videos play but they are coloured purple. When another video is played after the other you can see it partially overlaying. The videos also flicker. If you press a button to skip the videos it will crash. The menus load perfectly fine but when starting a new game it locks up at 30% loading completion.  After a second attempt at loading the game it did go in-game then crash. Everything was black when it did this. Sometimes it randomly crashes at loading up the videos, starting a new game so it's just inconsistent and not stable.

v1.0.0.0
Multiplayer(Reach xex) v1.0.1.0(?)

# Issues:
The game starts, but it will either hang during some point in the initial BIK intro or when the intro completes. The first loading screen also becomes very blurry. It is responsive to input, i.e. it will attempt to skip the intro when pressing A on a controller. The multiplayer XEX, which is just Halo Reach's patched to title update 1, crashes immediately upon boot.
